perturbation.original_text: This agreement (the "Agreement") is entered into as of May 18, 2010, (the "Effective Date") by and between Phoenix Performance, LLC, 481  Schuylkill Road, Phoenixville, PA 19460 ("Vendor") and Torvec Inc.., a New York corporation with its principal place of business located at 1999  Mt Read Blvd, Building 3, Rochester, NY. 14615 (Torvec).
perturbation.changed_text: This agreement (the "Agreement") is entered into as of May 18, 2010, (the "Effective Date") by and between Phoenix Performance, LLC, 481  Schuylkill Road, Phoenixville, PA 19460 ("Vendor") and Torvec Inc.., a New York corporation with its principal place of business located at 1999  Mt Read Blvd, Building 3, Rochester, NY. 14615 (Contractor).
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Torvec's' designation from 'Torvec' to 'Contractor' creates confusion about the defined role of Torvec. The rest of the document refers to 'Torvec' which is now inconsistent.
